Uses of Interface
com.ibm.db2.r2dbc.DB2Clob

    • Uses of DB2Clob in com.ibm.db2.r2dbc

      Methods in com.ibm.db2.r2dbc that return DB2Clob 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DB2Clob DB2Connection.createDB2Clob(reactor.core.publisher.Flux<? extends CharSequence> flux)
      Creates DB2Clob, a character large object that can be used as a CLOB input to prepared statement, using the user provided publisher of CharSequence.
      DB2Clob DB2Connection.createDB2Clob(String s)
      Creates DB2Clob, a character large object that can be used as a CLOB input to prepared statement, using the user provided string object.
